metadata.title: CVE-2024-5702 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Memory corruption in the networking stack could have led to a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR <115.12, and Thunderbird < 115.12.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-5702` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 2:1snap1-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1snap1-0ubuntu3').
